scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development rm settings.js && cp ../settings-dev.js settings.js && electron .
scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production rm settings.js && cp ../settings-prod.js settings.js && electron .
scripts.build-win: cd ..\client\ && grunt build && xcopy dist ..\server\dist /S /I /Y && cd ..\server && electron-packager . uMaster --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=1.2.2 --asar=true && xcopy ..\scripts uMaster-win32-ia32\resources\scripts /S /I /Y && move uMaster-win32-ia32 ..\..\ && rd /s /q dist
scripts.build-osx: cd ../client && grunt build && mkdir ../server/dist && cp -R dist/ ../server/dist && cd ../server && rm settings.js && cp ../settings-prod.js settings.js && electron-packager . uMaster --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=1.2.2 --asar=true && rm -rf dist/ && cp -R ../scripts uMaster-darwin-x64/uMaster.app/Contents/Resources/scripts
